returnPolicy.title: Return Policy
returnPolicy.p1: We have a 30-day return policy, which means you have 30 days after receiving your item to request a return.
returnPolicy.p2: To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You'll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.
returnPolicy.p3: Once we receive your item, we will inspect it and notify you that we have received your returned item. We will immediately notify you on the status of your refund after inspecting the item.
returnPolicy.p4: If your return is approved, we will initiate a refund to your credit card (or original method of payment). You will receive the credit within a certain amount of days, depending on your card issuers' policies.
returnPolicy.p5: You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable.

delivery.title: Delivery & Payment
delivery.processIntro: Shopping process is divided into two phases:
delivery.s1Title: Step 1. Select goods / Add to shopping Cart / Order check-out:
delivery.s1b2: Search your products using key words or pictures
delivery.s1b3: Make your choices and add to your shopping cart
delivery.s1b4: When complete, proceed to check out, and submit your order for review and approval by our customer service department
delivery.s1b5: During check-out, you can elect to have your order opened for verification and/or photographed for you
delivery.s2Title: Step 2. Order review and approval (within 6 hrs business hours of check-out submission):
delivery.s2bIntro: Once submitted, we review your order by:
delivery.s2b1: Ensuring compliance with Chinese regulations and restrictions
delivery.s2b2: Verifying the land shipping cost of the product within the Chinese territory
delivery.s2b3: We approve or reject your order
delivery.s3b1: An order approval text message/email will be sent to you with a direct link to the approved order, for payment
delivery.s3b2: You will make your payment using the option of your choice: Wanslu credit balance, Paypal, WeChat Pay, AliPay, Local Mobile Money accounts
delivery.s3b3: Once processed, we will transfer your remittance to the manufacturer for delivery of your goods to our warehouse
delivery.p2s1b1: Once we receive your order at our warehouse (generally within 3 business days), we will send you pictures of your goods
delivery.p2s1b2: Once you approved the goods on the pictures, we will send you a direct link to your order waybill processing
delivery.p2s1b3: Through the link, you will fill out your waybill information by adding your order's delivery address and international delivery mode
delivery.p2s2Title: Step 2. Waybill review and approval (within 6 business hrs of waybill submission)
delivery.p2s2b1: Once submitted, we review your waybill by weighting or sizing up your order depending on your international delivery mode selected
delivery.p2s2b2: We will calculate your international delivery cost according to the following basis:
delivery.p2s2b2b: Sea Cargo: Based Price / CBM (cubic meter)
delivery.p2s2b2c: Train Cargo: Based on Price / CBM (cubic meter)
delivery.p2s3b1: A waybill approval text message/email will be sent to you with a direct link to the approved waybill, for payment of your international freight charge
delivery.p2s3b2: You will make your payment using the option of your choice: Wanslu credit balance, Paypal, WeChat Pay, AliPay, Local Mobile Money accounts
delivery.p2s3b3: Once processed, we ship your order to your international delivery destination within 4 working days
delivery.p2s3b4: We will send you a notification of shipment

sensitive.title: Sensitive Products
sensitive.warning: Please contact if you intend to buy so that we can provide you a specific shipping quotation.
sensitive.listTitle: Below is a list of sensitive goods:
sensitive.listBody: Various controlled knives such as Swiss Army Knives, a full set of kitchen knives, kitchen knives, paper cutters/paper cutters/letter openers, gardening/knives/scissors/saws, stitch ripper/stitch ripper, explosive, flammable, corrosive, toxic, Strong acid, alkali and radioactive volatile dangerous goods, pure fruit and vegetable juice, gas lighter, all kinds of liquor, wine, cheese/Western cheese, hairy crabs, ice skate shoes, other outdoor knives, magnetic components, Swiss, smoke Labels/cigarette cards, vajra bell/vajra pestle/yue knife, seeds, fresh fish and meat, narcotic drugs and spiritual objects, etc.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are your trusted partner in wholesale purchasing and international shipping. Our mission is to provide seamless access to global markets with reliable purchasing agent services and efficient transportation solutions.
about.whatWeDoDescription: We specialize in wholesale purchasing and international transportation services, helping businesses and individuals access global markets with confidence and efficiency.
about.getInTouchDescription: Ready to start your wholesale journey? Contact us today for personalized solutions and expert guidance.

orderSuccess.title: Order Placed Successfully!
orderSuccess.reviewMessage: Your order has been successfully submitted and is under reviewed (2 to 10 hours). If your order contains mixed general goods with sensitive(batterie & liquid) there is a products types mixed, sensitive goods will be separated from general goods for safety and security reason according to the ICAO 9284 & IATA DGR regulation.
orderSuccess.notificationMessage: Be patient, you will receive notification for your order process by email and app. Thanks
